Registration submitted. Waiting for admin verification.

Your pharmacist documents are being reviewed. This usually takes 24–48 hours.
Your doctor documents are being reviewed. This usually takes 24–48 hours.
Video or audio consultations with verified doctors from your village. No need to travel far.
Access your health records even without internet. Use Call-Now when network is weak.
All doctors and pharmacists are verified with government IDs. Look for the verified badge for trust.

Sign in to continue to criticall

Already have an account? Sign In

OTP flow is not enabled on the server yet.
Password must be at least 6 characters

%1$s

Please verify your email first, then sign in.

If this email exists, we sent a reset link. Please check your inbox.
Your email is verified. Please sign in.
Choose a strong password to secure your account.
Email changed. Please resend OTP for this email.
Email changed. Please resend OTP for this email.
Enter your email address and we/ll send you a verification code to reset your password.
Password updated successfully. Please sign in with your new password.
Could not update password. Please try again.
We sent a 6-digit code to your email.

Account info, language, theme and logout.
Profile, verification status, settings and logout.
Your data is stored securely. Only verified admins can access verification tools. Do not share OTPs or passwords.
Your password has been successfully reset.\nYou can now sign in with your new password.
Please verify your email OTP first.
Account created successfully. Please sign in.
Could not create account. Please try again.
This email is already registered. Please sign in.

Share photos of symptoms, previous prescriptions, or test reports with your doctor
Tap the buttons below to add photos
Congratulations! You are now a verified pharmacist on criticall.
Congratulations! You are now a verified doctor on criticall.
This email is registered under a different role. Please go back and select the correct role.
This email is registered as %1$s. Please switch role and try again.
Please verify your email OTP first.
Patients can book appointments during these times
Note: Patients will see available slots based on your schedule. You can update this anytime.
What type of doctor do you need?
Select a specialty to find available doctors
Tip: Join the call 5 minutes before your scheduled time. Keep your health records ready for the doctor.
End time must be after start time.
Update your name and mobile number.
No verified doctors found for this speciality
Verified doctors for this speciality will appear here once they are approved.
We couldn’t find any doctors matching “%1$s”. Try a different keyword.
Update medicine quantities and keep availability accurate.
Add medicines first, then update quantities anytime.
Start typing, then select the medicine from the list.
Please select a medicine from the dropdown list.
You already have an upcoming appointment with this doctor.
Are you sure you want to book this appointment?
Add your first medicine item to start updating stock.
Search medicines and adjust quantities using quick controls.
Please select specialization from the list.
Please upload Medical License to continue.
Please enter your hospital / clinic name.
Please enter a valid experience value.
Enable location permission to show nearby pharmacies
Track your upcoming and past appointments.
Your appointments will appear here after you book.
You are all caught up! No unread notifications.
Select or describe your symptoms for AI analysis
e.g., I have had fever for 2 days with body pain
Note: This AI tool provides general guidance only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult a doctor for proper diagnosis.
Microphone permission is needed for voice input.
Voice input is not available on this device.
Please select at least one symptom or describe your symptoms.
Seek urgent help if you have:
This is general guidance, not a diagnosis.
Common cold / viral respiratory infection (varies by person)
Digestive upset / gastritis (can have many causes)
Fever with headache (monitor closely; consider consultation)
Fatigue / low energy (rest, hydration; consult if persistent)
Symptoms can have multiple causes; a doctor can guide best.
Drink fluids and eat light meals
Monitor temperature and symptoms over time
Difficulty breathing or severe shortness of breath
Severe vomiting, blood, or signs of dehydration
High fever lasting more than 3 days
This analysis is AI-generated and should not replace professional medical advice. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for diagnosis and treatment.
We recommend consulting a doctor within 24-48 hours
Take over-the-counter fever medicine if needed
Consult a doctor if symptoms worsen
Based on your symptoms, we recommend consulting a %1$s.
Often improves with rest and fluids. Watch for worsening.
Avoid oily/spicy foods; hydrate. Seek care if severe.
Rest, hydration, and reducing screen strain may help.
Rest and hydrate. Consider consultation if persistent.
Monitor symptoms and consult a doctor if needed.
Self-care is usually enough. Consult if not improving.
Seek medical help as soon as possible.
Add medicines in Update Stock to see them here.
Try a different keyword or change the filter.
All items are sufficiently stocked right now.
When a patient requests a medicine, it will appear here.
Medicine request #%1$s has been marked as fulfilled
You are all caught up. New requests will appear here.
To use all features (camera, microphone, location, phone, media, notifications), please allow permissions. You can enable them in Settings.
Enable microphone and camera access to join the call.
Enter your vital signs to track your health over time
Enter at least one value to save.
Saved locally. Will sync when online.
No active appointment to start consultation
Any additional instructions for the patient…
e.g., After 5 days if symptoms persist
• Find a quiet place for the call
• Have a pen and paper for notes

Upload clear photos/PDF. All documents must match the application.

For medical emergencies, call our 24/7 helpline

How do I book a consultation?
Please enter a valid phone number
Go to Appointments → Choose doctor → Select time slot → Confirm.
Open Profile → Upload Documents → Add required files and submit.
You can browse saved info offline. Actions will sync when internet returns.
Search medicine in Pharmacy section to check stock availability.
Try changing the filter or pull to refresh.
When someone submits their profile, it will appear here.

Ask about symptoms, precautions, or your next steps.
